channel.title: Watchos on Random Bits of Wisdom
channel.description: Recent content in Watchos on Random Bits of Wisdom

item.title: A Few Broken Windows
item.description: I have been using iOS 13 / iPadOS / watchOS 6 for a couple of weeks now. My general impression: something seems a bit off. Don’t get me wrong, the new features are great. I totally love the Dark Mode support, the new Notes features, etc. I also have managed to get through the whole update phase without any major issues. No iCloud syncing problems, no significant battery drain, no frequent restarts, or any of the kind.
